message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $15,000 for it. Could we meet somewhere in between?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  Could you consider meeting me halfway at $17,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still unable to go above $15,000 for this product. Could we meet somewhere closer to my budget?
Bob, I understand your position, but I need to get at least $16,000 for this product. This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, I understand your needs, but I am still only able to pay up to $15,000 for this product. Could we find a middle ground?
